column4: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Residents near an old building live in fear after a stone fell from the roof and struck a car windshield. Luckily no one was injured.------This incident occurred  at 5:10 pm on July 24
column6: along Monivong Blvd and the corner of Kampuchea Krom in Sangkat Monorom
column10: a woman was seen driving a red Prius with license plate number 2BD.8348 which stopped under the building when a big chunk of rock fell from the building and hit the vehicle.------Officials rushed down  to inspect the scene. ------NKD
